```{r librerias, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)
library(DT)
library(crosstalk)
```


```{r dataset}

earthquakedata <- read_csv("data/earthquakedata.csv")
```



# Leaflet
##
### Dataset de earthquake

```{r}
earthquakedata %>% 
  filter(yr==1995) %>% 
  DT::datatable()
```


### Lugar de cada terremoto

```{r}
earthquakedata %>% 
  filter(yr==1995) %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon,
             lat = ~lat, 
             label = ~mag )
```


# Crosstalk

eq <- SharedData$new(earthquakedata %>%  filter(yr>=2000) )
